title: What are the cognitive cons of multilingualism? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know about the scientific aspects but I can tell you that you will know and understand a lot of things without being able to explain it.  You'll know all these grammer rules but won't be able to teach it to someone else because you can't explain it. You'll just be able to do it.  Apart from that, I can't see any disadvantages. Well, sometimes you lose words. Like in a sentence or something, you know that theres a specific word to mean what you want to say in that specific sentence, but you forget what the word is. In like 5 minutes you get it though, but it's too late by then.  And that will happen even with your mother tongue.  (I speak 5 languages, learning a 6th)
